#define WINNIE_ALLOC_STATISTIC_ENABLED   0
 

enable counting of allocated blocks or not?

See also:
GetAllocInfo

#define WINNIE_ALLOC_THROW_STD_BADALLOC   1
 

when winnie_alloc can't allocate memory, it should return NULL or throw std::bad_alloc?

#define WINNIE_ALLOC_USE_MALLOC_THRESHOLD   0
 

use Winnie::Config::malloc_threshold or not? If USE_MALLOC_THRESHOLD is 0, then all refereces to malloc/free are removed and parameter malloc_threshold not used
